ModMetaData.name: RenameColony - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: Neon
ModMetaData.description: Rename your colony at any time! (This is the dev version of RenameColony. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
